metadata.title: CVE-2016-2441 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm buspm driver in Android before 2016-05-01 on Nexus 5X, 6, and6P devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application,aka internal bug 26354602.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
